item.title: The Shell Part III: Paradiso
item.description:
Title: The Shell Part III: Paradiso
Genre: Adventure , Simulation
Developer: Innocent Grey
Publisher: Shiravune
Franchise: Shiravune
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

The ranging chains of obsession that stretch from the infamous Girl In Shell case have dragged Detective Reiji Tokisaka back in for one final challenge—and everything he has left hangs in the balance.

FEATURES

  • 5+ hours of story
  • Multiple endings
  • Full Japanese voice acting by seasoned professionals
  • Fully remastered with new HD assets
  • The full trilogy is finally available!

The year is Showa 33—or 1958, by the new calendar.

It is an especially cold January, and amid the dour gray snow, a funeral is being held. A portrait of a girl's face sits there draped in snow, looking almost embarrassed and a little lonely...

The imprisoned painter Shinzo Mamiya died a scant few weeks after the Blessed Congregation's crimes came to light. Detective Reiji Tokisaka has been recruited by his old friend Maris Stella to help sort through the man's belongings, but instead they find an unknown work in his studio: a one-winged angel with no arms. The work, which they name Exile Of Paradise , is as beautiful as it is sinister—and it resembles his infamous masterpiece Girl In Shell .

A few more days later, a woman's corpse is found, modified in the manner depicted in Exile . She is identified as having formerly worked with Tomoyuki Masaki.

There may be no one left who can cut the chain of obsession that began with Girl In Shell —nobody but one small girl.

E quell'ossessione fa girare il sole e tutte le stelle.

CHARACTERS



Reiji Tokisaka (Voice: Waruta Higeuchi)
Occupation: Private Detective

A man shouldering dark memories and a difficult past. He's solved many cases, made friends as well as lost them—and all the while, he's been desperately searching for a girl who disappeared.


Yukari Tokisaka (Voice: Rino Kawashima)
Occupation: Student

Reiji Tokisaka's little sister is the perfect model of a Japanese woman, always kind and caring towards her older brother. Currently having difficulty planning her future, since it's tricky to make a living as an artist. As she blossoms into womanhood, she still has the same relationship with Masaki as ever: not too close, but not too far. (She's starting to have thoughts about this.)


Tomoyuki Masaki (Voice: Masato Kawamura)
Occupation: Assistant at the Tokisaka Detective Agency

Ever since Yukari stopped him from committing suicide in Inokashira Park, Masaki has been doing what he can to help her brother out at the Tokisaka Detective Agency. Emotionally distant to the point that even the death of a close acquaintance can't shake him, he's recently resumed therapy with a psychiatrist at the hospital. He assists Reiji's investigations in the hopes of finding his childhood friend who turned to crime and disappeared.


Ayumu Sato (Voice: Kaname Yuzuki)
Occupation: Student

Yukari's underclassman at their girls' school who has a powerful sense of justice and dreams of working as a detective's Watson. Having come to understand how hard the job of a detective's assistant is (largely because Reiji won't take her on), she's been thinking more seriously about the future of late.
Her androgynous looks have also won her a certain popularity on campus.


Kyoko Hazuki (Voice: Kaname Yuzuki)
Occupation: Cafe Owner

This resilient woman runs the Moon World cafe, which she inherited from her late husband. Previously had a physical relationship with Reiji, who had also lost someone important to him, and believed that the two could heal each other's wounds, but the two are now moving in different directions.
She still struggles with the fact that Reiji's heart is elsewhere. However, someone else might be looking her way...


Toji Aoki (Voice: Kanon Morii)
Occupation: Freelance Reporter

Formerly a high-ranking member of the Ueno-based organization known as the Hand of Death, after the case involving the Senri cult, she awoke to the joys of journalism. Now, she runs independent investigations into various social issues, and sometimes cooperates with both Reiji and the police. Most famous for her keen eye and physical abilities, which let her go toe to toe with dangerous criminals.


Natsume Takashiro (Voice: Hikaru Isshiki)
Occupation: Coroner

The head of the Takashiro Clinic, and a skilled doctor who prefers dissecting murder victims to healing those who are still alive. Though professionally reliable, her eccentric personality and deviant proclivities leave others in a perpetual state of bewilderment when dealing with her.


Maris Stella (Voice: Yuzuki Akishiro)
Occupation: Museum Curator

A curator at the Tokyo Metropolitan Art Museum. She first met Reiji during his investigation into the Girl In Shell case and has deep connections to both Toji and Rokushiki.
Typically difficult to engage in conversation, she becomes surprisingly fluent when the topic turns to art.
Between the discovery of Mamiya's unannounced work Exile of Paradise and the situation with Rokushiki, a new void is opening up in her heart. Where will the currents of fate take her...?


Kaede Watanuki (Voice: Hazuki Hina)
Occupation: Psychiatrist

A mental health specialist who works part time at Kuchiki Hospital. Responsible for both Masaki and Michiru's treatment.
Kaede views Masaki as a fascinating subject because he received counseling from Rokushiki in the past. She, too, has dreams of interviewing the latter and attempt to analyze his mind, but might find the task more difficult than she bargained for.


Sei Maezono (Voice: Mei Hanazono)
Occupation: Art Gallery Staff

A laid-back, somewhat sloppy woman who works at Sasakura Gallery in Kichijoji. Her work with old art materials for the gallery has partially morphed into a collecting hobby, and her clothes are often covered with paint stains.
Masaki also worked at the gallery for a time, making the two of them former coworkers. Sei seems to have trouble remembering names, however, as she calls Masaki something new every time she encounters him.


Toko Kuchiki (Voice: Aji Sanma)
Occupation: Student

A girl who met the detective Reiji Tokisaka in Inokashira Park in the March of 1956. She asked him to find her true self.
Deeply lonely, the better he came to understand her, the more she was drawn to him, and their wounded souls came to find comfort in each other.
However, she was caught in an accident and, while she managed to hang onto her life, was left incapacitated and kidnapped shortly thereafter. It seems there had been a new life growing inside her belly at the time...

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Contains suggestive themes, brief depictions of threats and harassment, some depictions of gore and corpses during murder investigations, crude humor and crass language.

item.title: None Shall Intrude
item.description:
Title: None Shall Intrude
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: Aeterna Ludi
Publisher: GrabTheGames
Franchise: GrabTheGames
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

None Shall Intrude invites you to embrace the unparalleled power of a Raid Boss in a unique and immersive gaming experience. Prepare to traverse vibrant realms, engage in intense battles, and conquer all who dare to challenge your dominance. As the embodiment of chaos, your reign will be defined by strategic prowess, unique tile interactions with elemental flavor, boss mechanics you learn as you play.

CHAOS INCARNATE

As the unkillable embodiment of chaos, death means nothing to you as your soul is permanently tied to this land of mortals! With each new life, you gain more power, and each cycle opens up new possibilities to grow stronger.

CONQUER THE WORLD

Forge your journey by selecting different routes from nodes on the map, ultimately conquering full regions .Along the way, you'll explore a variety of vibrant and imaginative landscapes , each filled with unique obstacles and creatures. Whether it's dense woodlands , majestic snowy mountains , or boundless desert sands . The world of Herelon is full of diverse location for you to explore and conquer!

ELEMENTAL COMBOS

Navigate the battlefield using a tile-based system, employing various primordial elements and combine them into potent interactions. Discover all 18 possible tile interactions and tailor your build to your preferred style of play, destroying your enemies with style!

TALENTS

Level up your boss to unlock many new cards and relics . Accumulate talent points to invest in a talent tree , which can be customized before each run, enabling you to adapt your boss's play style to suit your preferences.

BOSS MECHANICS

As the Chaos Incarnate , you possess 3 Phases . The road to power means unlocking your latent "Boss Mechanics" . These mechanics work across distinct phases, with 24 unique powers attainable through in-game achievements . Combine up to 4 "Boss Mechanics" to craft your personalized Raid Boss .

RELICS

As you conquer regions or defeat powerful foes , you'll acquire special relics to enhance your elemental tile interactions even more.

item.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
item.description:
Title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Games Farm , ARTillery
Publisher: Grindstone
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike, horde-survivor game with top-notch graphics. Choose one of the damned heroes and attempt to pass the Gods' test by fighting your way through waves of mythical adversaries.

If you succeed in all the trials, you will become the chosen Jotunnslayer.

Engage in adrenaline-fueled battles, fighting off endless waves of enemies as you strive to survive. Complete various objectives, defeat the final boss, and earn the ultimate prizes.


Take on challenging missions during each run to test your skills and enrich your journey through the Nine Worlds.These quests may involve completing specific objectives or overcoming additional obstacles as you battle relentless enemies on your way to the final challenge.

Improve your abilities with meta-progression systems that offer unlockable perks, in-game skills, or upgrades. As you progress further, you'll gain access to new abilities, weapons, and bonuses that allow you to customize your playstyle and improve your chances of survival.

Select from a roster of diverse characters, each equipped with unique skills, abilities, and weapons. Mix and match combinations to refine your builds and overcome the many challenges posed by the Hordes of Hel.

Face a variety of increasingly challenging Boss enemies as you progress through the game. Outmaneuver and defeat these formidable foes using the environment, your skills, and abilities to gain the advantage and achieve victory.

item.title: Somber Echoes
item.description:
Title: Somber Echoes
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: Rock Pocket Games , Lav Games
Publisher: Bonus Stage Publishing
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

Somber Echoes is a dark-fantasy metroidvania rooted in ancient Greek mythologies. You shall set out to stop your twin sister from destroying the universe and venture into the challenges and mysteries ahead, to find the answers to the questions hidden under the ashes of a impending destruction of the worlds. The decisions you make when you play determine your fate and ending of the game.

Story Overview

A cataclysmic event turned the once beautiful and proud Greco-Roman space vessel Atromitos into breeding grounds for infested horrors from an unknown dimension. In the aftermath, a mysterious force choses to interfere with destiny and awaken Adrestia from rubble and ashes.

As Adrestia, your mission is to stop your twin sister Harmonia from unraveling the universe, but many questions remain unanswered. In the search for answers you explore the vast space vessel while gaining powers, knowledge and skills that might shape your ultimate destiny.

Experience a Metroidvania where combat is about mastering acrobatic freedom. Explore an environment that embraces diverse gameplay styles to suit every player.

Stunning environments

Beautifully crafted distinct districts.

Multiple «biomes»:

Master perfect parry to gain advantage in combat

Progressive traversal

Game Features

  • Story inspired by Greek tragedies and Greek Mythology

  • Unique Greco-Roman science fiction setting

  • Visceral combat and acrobatic player freedom

  • Multiple distinctive districts (biomes) with their own visual identity

  • Multiple endings: how you play determines how you complete the game

item.title: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
item.description:
Title: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
Genre: Indie , Racing , Sports
Developer: Megagon Industries
Publisher: Megagon Industries
Franchise: Lonely Mountains
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

Take a deep breath, count to three, and… go! Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is a game that balances serious challenge with a relaxing atmosphere. Slice through deep snow, skitter over ice lakes, and leap into the air in spectacular jumps, bringing your friends along for the ride.

Snow Riders also adds a brand new feature to the Lonely Mountains world – online multiplayer! Work your way down the mountain as a team in co-op, carefully sharing your limited checkpoints, or compete in a breakneck race to the base in versus mode. Available for 2-8 players, with multiplatform crossplay.

Perform daredevil tricks or try to best your time for a spot on the leaderboard. Or you can take the road less travelled, discovering shortcuts as you explore the slope. Unlock new equipment, outfits and tricks as you play!

Whether you’re looking for a challenge or a chilled out vacation with friends, Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is the perfect winter getaway.
